title: Just Her Luck: Contemporary Whychoose Fantasy Romance
description: Genevieve Ferguson didn't know what she was getting herself into when she agreed to fill in for her ailing aunt at the Harrisons' ranch.Seeing as to how this is Aunt Ruthie and you can't ever outguess the spry, quirky old woman, she should have known better.The smart-mouthed, prickly new ranch housekeeper quickly finds herself in over her head, roped right into the crazy, kooky family madness and antics of the Harrison men.One sassy gal with a chip on her shoulder and the five crazy, stubborn Harrison brothers she's promised her aunt to help look after, all crammed under one roof.What could possibly go wrong?Everything.And it was just her luck.This book is a Contemporary Whychoose Fantasy Romantic Comedy
author: Jeanette Lynn
